title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fried mix of vegetables with soy sauce and sesame oil.

title: Classic Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and melted cheese on a toasted bun.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: A selection of fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate ganache.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
